projects.name: Data Annotation Tool
projects.description: Data Annotation Tool is a project that aims to label patterns (images) by its color, category and prompt. It is been using by approximately a hundred students who has a major in textile and design.
projects.usedTechnologies: VueJS (Composition API), Bootstrap Icons, Styled-components, Pinia state management, Jquery, Ajax

projects.name: ETL Pipeline
projects.description: ETL Pipeline is designed for collecting data, mainly images from the customers. There are upload button and history page. This was my internship project; therefore i also wrote backend of this project.
projects.usedTechnologies: Python, HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS, Styled-components, PIL library, Inkscape, Resnet, MongoDB, AWS S3

projects.name: Variant Project
projects.description: Variant Project is a project that aims to produce marble patterns which are generated by a speacial machine learning algorithm. Maximum 4 patterns are produced and displayed on the screen. Before production, it is expected from user to enter parameters. Video shows the only frontend of the project.
projects.usedTechnologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS, Styled-components, Axios, Redux

projects.name: Admin Panel
projects.description: Admin panel is designed for MYTH AI's main product to manage users, companies, download counts & histories etc. It includes a lot of private information so that only library is shown in the video.
projects.usedTechnologies: HTML, CSS, Javascirpt, VueJS (Options API), Bootstrap Icons, Axios, Pinia

projects.name: Agricultural Website
projects.description: It is an agricultural website to promote İrem Tarım which is a shop selling agricultural products in a small city in Turkey.
projects.usedTechnologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS, Bootstrap Icons

projects.name: Shopping Website
projects.description: This is a website for shopping. It is designed as sport UI but it can be arranged to any other category.
projects.usedTechnologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS, Material UI Icons

projects.name: Certificate Page
projects.description: Certificate page is for showing certificates to the user to keep track his/her downloads. Every download produces a certificate in pdf format and save it in certificates pages. Certifcate page allow user to edit certificate names, download the certificates, or delete it.
projects.usedTechnologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, VueJS (Options API), Pinia, Bootsrap Icons, Axios

projects.name: CV Website 1.0
projects.usedTechnologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS, Material UI Icons

projects.name: CV Website 2.0
